Question.Subject: What would happen if you flew the flag of South Vietnam in Modern day Vietnam?

ChosenAnswer: It would be similar to flying the flag of the Third Reich in modern day Germany or in Israel. You would be violating the law. The police would make you take it down and you may face fines and imprisonment (but definitely not execution.) You will also face the ire of most people there.

Answers.Answer: They might be imprisoned or executed
Yes, it would be an execution punishment.
